communityStandards.title: Community Standards
communityStandards.stance: This portal prioritizes housing, health, and dignity. Enforcement-only proposals aren’t advanced to plans.
communityStandards.reminder: By contributing, you agree to keep language respectful, anonymize neighbours unless they opt in, and focus on collaborative solutions.
values: Lead with strengths and respect lived experience.
Offer solutions that improve safety, housing stability, and health access.
Share only anonymized information about neighbours and service users.

communityProject.label: Community project board
communityProject.description: Ideas in progress with neighbours, agencies, and Town staff.
communityProject.helper: See which ideas are moving forward and what support is needed next.

support.tooltip: Choose an emoji to show how this idea lands for you.
support.guestPrompt: Sign in to add a reaction.

quick.name: Quick Idea
quick.description: Share a headline and short blurb now. You can come back to add full details later.
quick.upgradePrompt: Add evidence, steps, risks, and metrics to move this idea forward.
quick.nudge: Finish the full proposal when you’re ready so moderators can move it ahead.

examples.problem: Example: Overnight outreach teams can’t find people when shelters are full.
examples.evidence: Example: Shelter occupancy has exceeded 95% for 12 nights in a row.
examples.proposedChange: Example: Open a rotating warming space with trained volunteers.
examples.steps: Example: Recruit volunteers, confirm venue, publish schedule.
examples.risks: Example: Volunteers may need de-escalation support.
examples.metrics: Example: Overnight check-ins completed per week.
examples.metricsFallback: Not sure yet? Choose “I don’t know yet” and we’ll help find the right metric.
